title: DataTransferLegalBasis
description: classification that pertains to how an atomic piece of data must be treated in order to be compliant with GDPR

legalBasisType.description: The type of legal basis used to transfer data outside the EU according to the GDPR

description.description: Describes the legal basis of the transfer

proofUrl.description: Links to the proof of the data transfer legal basis (url or internal path)

isConsent.description: Specifies if the transfer legal basis is consent (article 49 GDPR)
